__TOC__

This section provides a list of documents intended to help you to '''view''' and '''edit''' your photos on Ubuntu.

=== Applications and Glossary ===

* <nowiki>[[GraphicsApplications|Graphics Applications]]</nowiki> - A list of graphics applications which you can use to view and edit your photos
* <nowiki>[[Photos-Glossary|Glossary of Graphics Terms]]</nowiki> - A glossary of terms relating to photos and graphics

=== Viewing and Sharing Photos ===

* <nowiki>[[Photos-Slideshows|Slideshows]]</nowiki> - Watch slideshows of your photos
* <nowiki>[[Photos-Printing|Printing Photos]]</nowiki> - Print-out your photos
* <nowiki>[[Photos-PublishingOnline|Publishing Photos on the Internet]]</nowiki> - Share your photos by publishing them online
* <nowiki>[[Photos-P2PPhotosharing|Peer-to-Peer Photo Sharing]]</nowiki> - Share and sync your photos privately using Tonido Photos

* <nowiki>[[Photos-Calendar|Calendar]]</nowiki> - Make a calendar using your photos

=== Correcting and Editing Photos ===

* <nowiki>[[Photos-RotatingPhotos|Rotating a photo]]</nowiki> - Rotate photos which are orientated the wrong way
* <nowiki>[[Photos-RetouchPhotos|Retouching photos]]</nowiki> - Remove blemishes and unwanted objects from photos
* <nowiki>[[Photos-Sepia|Sepia photos]]</nowiki> - Add a sepia effect to make photos look old
* <nowiki>[[Photos-CorrectColor|Correct colors]]</nowiki> - Correct the colors in photos
* <nowiki>[[Photos-ResizingPhotos|Resizing photos]]</nowiki> - Resize photos which are too big
* <nowiki>[[Photos-RemovingNoise|Removing noise]]</nowiki> - Remove noise/speckles from photos
* <nowiki>[[Photos-ArtisticEffects|Artistic effects]]</nowiki> - Add fun effects to photos which make them look like paintings
* <nowiki>[[Photos-BatchRenaming|Batch Renaming]]</nowiki> - Rename large numbers of photos

=== Tutorials ===

* <nowiki>[[Photos-LinuxAndPhotography|Linux and Photography]]</nowiki> - Article on using Linux in photographic work
* <nowiki>[[F-SpotHowto|F-Spot Tutorial]]</nowiki> - Comprehensive tutorial on using the ''F-Spot Photo Manager''
* <nowiki>[[TheGimpHowto|The GIMP Howto]]</nowiki> - List of online resources useful for users of the ''GIMP Image Editor''
* <nowiki>[[http://gimp-savvy.com/|Gimp Savvy]]</nowiki> - An online book on how to use the ''GIMP''
